decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

CRE-100 (Ground Floor Plan - Existing); CRE-101 (First Floor Plan - Existing); CRE-102 (Second Floor Plan - Existing); CRE-103 (Front & Rear Elevations - Existing); CRE-104 (Right Side Elevations - Existing); CRE-105 (Roof Plan - Existing); CRE-106 (Ground Floor Plan - Demolition); CRE-107 (First Floor Plan - Demolition); CRE-108 (Second Floor Plan - Demolition); CRE-109 (Front & Rear Elevations - Demolition); CRE-110 (Right Side Elevations - Demolition); CRE-111 (Roof Plan - Demolition); CRE-112 (Ground Floor Plan - Proposed); CRE-113 (First Floor Plan - Proposed); CRE-114 (Second Floor Plan - Proposed); CRE-115 Rev A (Front & Rear Elevations - Proposed); CRE-116 (Side Elevation - Proposed); CRE-117 (Roof Plan - Proposed); CRE-118 (Site Plan); CRE-119 (Location Plan); Design and Access Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension; replacement timber framed windows; installation of two roof lights to rear roof slope (Following demolition of existing conservatory)
